name: workspace
description: -	Finish at a certain time – cut off time for work is 5.30pm  -	Although some people work at different times of day – also people work at different speeds -	Everyone should feel free to say if they’re fatigued  -	There’s going to be overtime but not let it happen too often -	Avoid work on weekends – but sometimes unavoidable   -	depends on person -	respect others obligations
